AD_FightOutOfTheCreche.synopsis: Laezel says Vlaakith must have ordered the Creche to kill her. Says  they must fight their way through. If not been to the Zaithisk yet, she says they must go.
AD_FightOutOfTheCreche.how_to_trigger: Plays when Laezel encounters an enemy in the Creche after the Inquisitor fight.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The provided data contains only one session, 'AD_FightOutOfTheCreche'. The synopsis indicates that this session is triggered after the Inquisitor fight in the Creche and mentions that if the Zaithisk hasn’t been visited, the party should go there. However, since there are no other sessions provided in the input to compare against or establish a sequence with, we cannot derive any strict ordering or mutual exclusiveness rules from the available data.

AD_FightOutOfTheCreche_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_FightOutOfTheCreche_0.text: Tsk'va - my own people seek my head.

AD_FightOutOfTheCreche_2.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_FightOutOfTheCreche_2.text: To the zaith'isk. To the cure!

AD_FightOutOfTheCreche_1.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_FightOutOfTheCreche_1.text: If they will not see sense, then bleed them dry!
